name: DBD Pinterest Widget
author: Justin Norton

sections.description: The Designer by Design Pinterest widget is highly customisable, featuring the ability to specify a user account link, user account feed and number of items to display within the widget block. The widget works by parsing the Pinterest user feed to provide thumbnails and a short descriptions of each feed item. Cross-browser CSS and JavaScript is used to provide a thumbnail preview of each item within the widget.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the widget using the appearance screen

short_description: This simple Pinterest widget features an easy way to add multiple Pinterest widgets to your website.
description: The Designer by Design Pinterest widget is highly customisable, featuring the ability to specify a user account link, user account feed and number of items to display within the widget block. The widget works by parsing the Pinterest user feed to provide thumbnails and a short descriptions of each feed item. Cross-browser CSS and JavaScript is used to provide a thumbnail preview of each item within the widget.

screenshots.caption: Widget Edit Screen - Insert your Pinterest user account URL, your Pinterest user account and feed and how many items you want to display and the widget takes care of the rest.

Widget output - Widget output is controlled by CSS and JQuery resulting in centrally aligned images and a short description of each item in the Pinterest feed. Everything is them able using the included CSS style sheet within the plugin folder.
